languages.text: Allies gain +Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} on their first {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusing{/g} (9): allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +9 bonus to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 Perception
languages.original_text: Союзники получают +{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}ВОС{/g} навигатора {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} дополнительно в свой первый {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Насыщение{/g} (9): союзники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают бонус +9 ко всем {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g} до конца следующего хода навигатора. Этот бонус суммируется, и при каждом применении его действие продлевается до следующего хода навигатора. +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} +10 к Восприятию

This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 Perception

languages.text: 所有盟友在首个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}时，获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，等同于导航者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}灌注{/g}（9）：所有被导航者能力影响的盟友，所有{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}提高9点，效果持续至导航者下个回合结束。此效果可多次叠加，且每次叠加时，效果都会延长至导航者的下个回合。 +10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g} +10感知
languages.original_text: Allies gain +Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} on their first {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusing{/g} (9): allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +9 bonus to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 Perception

traits.locale_text: 所有盟友在首个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}时，获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，等同于导航者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}灌注{/g}（9）：所有被导航者能力影响的盟友，所有{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}提高9点，效果持续至导航者下个回合结束。此效果可多次叠加，且每次叠加时，效果都会延长至导航者的下个回合。 +10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g} +10感知

languages.text: 味方は最初の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}で、航宙士の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}分の追加{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を獲得する。 {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}注入{/g}(9)：航宙士のパワーのターゲットとなった味方は航宙士の次のターン終了時まで全ての{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}に対してボーナス9を獲得する。このボーナスはスタックされ、スタックのたびに航宙士の次のターンまで延長される。 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}が+10増加 認知力が+10増加
languages.original_text: Allies gain +Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} on their first {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusing{/g} (9): allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +9 bonus to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 Perception

traits.locale_text: 最初の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}で味方に航宙士の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}分の追加{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を付与。 {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}注入{/g}9：航宙士のパワーのターゲットとなった味方は、航宙士の次のターン終了時まで全ての能力に対してボーナス+9を獲得。ボーナスはスタックされ、スタックする度に航宙士の次のターンまで延長される。 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}+10 認知力+10

languages.text: Los aliados obtienen +{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} del navegante de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} adicional en su primer {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusión{/g} (9): Los aliados objetivo de los poderes del navegante reciben una bonificación de +9 a todas sus {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} hasta el final del próximo turno del navegante. Esta bonificación se acumula y se prolonga hasta el siguiente turno del navegante cada vez que se acumula. +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} +10 de Percepción
languages.original_text: Allies gain +Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} on their first {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusing{/g} (9): allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +9 bonus to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 Perception

traits.locale_text: Los aliados obtienen +{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} del navegante de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} adicional en su primer {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusión{/g} 9: Los aliados objetivo de los poderes del navegante reciben una bonificación de +9 a todas sus características hasta el final del próximo turno del navegante. Esta bonificación se acumula y se prolonga hasta el próximo turno del navegante cada vez que se aplica. +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} +10 de Percepción

languages.text: Verbündete erhalten zusätzlich +Navigator-{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}WAH{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} für ihren nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Durchtränkung{/g} 9: Verbündete, die von Navigator-Kräften anvisiert werden, erhalten bis zum Ende des nächsten Zuges des Navigators einen Bonus von +9 auf sämtliche {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}. Dieser Bonus ist stapelbar und wird mit jedem Stapel bis zum nächsten Zug des Navigators verlängert. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} +10 Wahrnehmung
languages.original_text: Allies gain +Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} on their first {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusing{/g} (9): allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +9 bonus to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 Perception

traits.locale_text: Verbündete erlangen zusätzlich +Navigator-{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}WAH{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} bei ihrem nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Durchdringend{/g} 9: Verbündete, die von Navigator-Kräften anvisiert werden, erlangen bis zum Ende des nächsten Navigator-Zugs einen Bonus von +9 auf sämtliche Eigenschaften. Dieser Bonus addiert sich und wird pro Addition bis zum nächsten Zug des Navigators verlängert. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} +10 Wahrnehmung

languages.text: Les alliés bénéficient de +({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} du navigateur) {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} supplémentaires lors de leur premier {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Imprégnation{/g} (9) : un bonus de +9 s'applique à toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} des alliés ciblés par des pouvoirs du navigateur jusqu'à la fin de son tour suivant. Ce bonus est cumulable, et à chaque cumul, il est prolongé jusqu'au tour suivant du navigateur. +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} +10 de Perception
languages.original_text: Allies gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} additional {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} on their first {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusing{/g} (9): allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +9 bonus to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 Perception

traits.locale_text: Les alliés bénéficient de +({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} du navigateur) {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} supplémentaires lors de leur premier {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Imprégnation{/g} (9) : un bonus de +9 s'applique à toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} des alliés ciblés par des pouvoirs du navigateur jusqu'à la fin de son tour suivant. Ce bonus est cumulable, et à chaque cumul, il est prolongé jusqu'au tour suivant du navigateur. +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} +10 de Perception

This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 Perception

This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 Perception

languages.text: Dost birimler, ilk {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turlarında{/g} +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} kadar ilave {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} kazanırlar. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Aşılayıcı{/g} (9): Rotacı güçlerinin hedef aldığı dost birimler, tüm {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliklerine{/g} +9 bonus alırlar. Bu etki, Rotacı'nın bir sonraki turunun sonuna dek sürer. Bu bonus üst üste birikir ve her yeni birikimde etki süresi Rotacı'nın bir sonraki turuna dek uzar. +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} +10 Algı
